Articles.Content:
Well, I may very well have stumbled upon the future Mrs. Whackjob. Things are going incredibly well. I'm a very lucky man, and I know it. I somehow stumbled across one of those incredibly rare people. The kind you only longingly hope to meet and date, but never actually expect to be lucky enough to.

I will spoil her rotten. Even if we do move in together, get married, have children, the courtship will continue. Until I am old and grey and bent. As long as I can.

She is worth every effort and significantly more besides.

I am a very lucky man.
I wonder if she is reading all of this because it is really sweet.
Nope! She's not a gamer. She's got no idea. It's okay. I let her know she's incredible via other, more direct methods.

Have you tried making her a cake?

Edited October 10, 2015 by NFUN

Have you tried making her a cake?

A cake with solid rocket boosters?

Three month anniversary was Monday. I had to work that night, but I stopped in with an armload of flowers. And I told her I loved her.

I went to work, then, but not after being on the receiving end of a barrage of kisses.

Who knows? Maybe in a year or so you'll all get to see wedding pictures. I already know where the honeymoon would be. She has fond memories of Hawaii. I've never been there, but Kona coffee is best coffee, and coffee is my beer.
Good to hear man. Glad you are enjoying your relationship.
Way to go, Whackjob! If your bouquet of flowers was as big as your smallest rocket, she'll definitely know you love her.
